metadata.title: CVE-2017-5946 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The Zip::File component in the rubyzip gem before 1.2.1 for Ruby has a directory traversal vulnerability. If a site allows uploading of .zip files, an attacker can upload a malicious file that uses "../" pathname substrings to write arbitrary files to the filesystem.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-5946` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-zip - 1.2.0-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-zip package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.0-1.1').
